gloomhaven.title: Gloomhaven
gloomhaven.summary: Gloomhaven is a highly-rated dungeon crawler with 90+ scenarios, a global campaign and a dynamic combat system.

pandemic.title: Pandemic
pandemic.summary: Pandemic is a cooperative board game where 4-6 friends work together to cure 4 global epidemics before it dooms the world!

telestrations.title: Telestrations
telestrations.summary: Telestrations: after dark is a risque social game where people draw pictures of words provided and pass the drawing to another player to guess the original word.  This is done in repeated fashion.

descent.title: Descent: Journey into Darkness
descent.summary: Descent is a dungeon crawler with an engaging highly descriptive plot, a series of modular boards and beautiful figurines.
